body:
Sports bettors providing 2021 Grammys Predictions?

Yeah. Fark yeah.

We bet on anything we can find an edge. And that definitely includes entertainment and political markets.

The first of those in 2021 is the Grammys.

And the betting markets are dominated by the divas.

In this Grammys Predictions piece, we'll look at the most popular betting markets:

> * Record Of The Year
> * Album Of The Year
> * Song of the Year
> * Best New Artist

- - -

## **Record Of The Year**

<canvas id='g120' name="brgraph" data-file-name="grammysRecordYear.json" data-only-names="Don't Start Now - Dua Lipa,Black Parade - Beyonce,Circles - Post Malone" data-start="2021-02-26 00:00" width="400" height="150"></canvas>

- - -

## **Album Of The Year**

<canvas id='g121' name="brgraph" data-file-name="grammysAlbumYear.json" data-only-names="Folklore-Taylor Swift,Future Nostalgia-Dua Lipa,Hollywood's Bleeding-P Malone" data-start="2021-02-26 00:00" width="400" height="150"></canvas>

- - -

## **Song Of The Year**

<canvas id='g122' name="brgraph" data-file-name="grammysSongYear.json" data-only-names="Cardigan - Taylor Swift,Don't Start Now - Dua Lipa,Black Parade - Beyonce" data-start="2021-02-26 00:00" width="400" height="150"></canvas>

- - -

## **Best New Artist**

<canvas id='g123' name="brgraph" data-file-name="grammysAlbumYear.json" data-only-names="Megan Thee Stallion,Doja Cat,Phoebe Bridgers" data-start="2021-02-26 00:00" width="400" height="150"></canvas>

title: Grammys Predictions 2021: Your Best Bets
description: If you want expert Grammys Predictions, from professional sports bettors, then click on through. Unlike the blog crowd, we put our money where our mouth is. 2021 Grammys Predictions.
